From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>

::Shadow Wing::

She flew back to the base after she calmed down.   She knew that she was no 
fighter.  She felt dissapointed in herself.  She thought she could make him 
think that she could make it.  But she failed herself as well as him.  She 
knew he was a fighter, a better hunter.  He would survive.  She transformed 
into her bot mode.  She lifted her head, swallowed her spark, and walked in. 
  She saw Lunarpine out of the corner of her eye.  She didn't turn to face 
him, she just kept walking.  She knew her emotions were her weakness.  But 
she couldn't help it.  Her spark was as big as the rest of her. Normally she 
wouldn't mind, but now, she hated that fact.  She just walked to her room 
and sat on her bed.  She leaned forward, rested her head in her hands and 
started to cry again.  She hated and liked him at the same time.  And now 
she couldn't even look at him.  She wanted to rip out her spark. She just 
sat there and let her spark burn.


---original message----
From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
Date: Wed Jul 5, 2000 10:44pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Lunarpine could see her pain, Shadow Wing wasn't programmed as a
warrior. He saw that now, he fealt for her but knew that a wolf and
an owl weren't meant to work together, were they? He turned back to
the crow and gobbled it up. In his world scavenging food was just as
important as hunting it. Shadow Wing was a good hunter as an owl but
she didn't seam to realize that she was more. she has the ability to
change into something that gives her an edge yo the hunt. If she
could learn that, she might survive. In the cold he'd want her at his
side, but he still wasn't sure how she'd fight in this climate. Her
emotions were her weakness. One moment she wanted the hunt, the kill,
the next moment she wanted to run away and hide.
"I'm sorry." he said more to himself than to her. "I'm sorry I had to
do that to help you survive."
Lunarpine wiped his mouth and headed back to base, alone again.
